CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 27, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "Dance Artist - Possessing more than her share of personality and... [illegible] cute little Mamie Helen Hamilton will appear in one of her... [ill.] Schenley High Auditorium tonight (Thursday). Mamie... [ill.] pupil of her mother, Mrs. Royal Hamilton. This affair... [ill.] Beauty Shop Owners Association Third Annual Negro... [ill.] All proceeds go to charity. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mamie Hamilton wearing light colored dance costume, posed with palms facing upward, seated in Harris Studio
